attributes.action: Advertise MP Support Jobs on the open job market through Job Centre Plus
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The recent case of MP expenses has highlighted the employment of spouses, family members and friends directly by MP's who pay these people using tax payers money, and do not advertise these jobs on the open market. This practise must stop and all support jobs which are payable by the tax-payer must be available on the open jobs market.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament: http://www.parliament.uk/
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
